description: Great for spicing up your messages a little

Great app with lots of choosable ASCII styles. 
Only wish if there would a be a live preview when choosing a style, because trying to go through all the options in the little drop down window only by name until you find something you like is a little tedious.
summary: Was really missing something like this

description: That was pretty. I firstly said but I will use it once in a year so lets remove it. But then, I found that why should I remove it when it's completely sandboxed and very lightweight? Let be there, it's much better than searching for a tool like it in internet few times a year.
